relationships.description: Lesley Groff is assistant to Jeffrey Epstein
Associate Professor at MIT Media Lab and McGovern Institute

analysis.purpose: Rescheduling a meeting between Jeffrey Epstein and Ed Boyden after a previous cancellation
analysis.significance: Shows Epstein's connections to MIT researchers and involvement in scientific initiatives

notable_quotes: Sorry again for that last minute cancellation in the Spring -- alas, the perils of running a new center, that I no longer control my schedule like in the good old days.
But the Obama BRAIN Initiative is running strong, and MIT has a good bid for a seat at the table, so that is good.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - appears to be routine scheduling communication

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - routine email about scheduling a meeting

public_knowledge.context: Shows Epstein's connections to MIT researchers and scientific initiatives, which may be of interest given his later legal troubles

analysis.summary: Email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and MIT professor Ed Boyden rescheduling a meeting after a previous cancellation, with discussion of the Obama BRAIN Initiative and MIT's involvement in neuroscience research.
